edu.sysu.lhfcws.mailplus.server.protocol

接口 POP3Client

  • 所有已知实现类:
    POP3JavaMailClient, POP3ProtocolClient

    public interface POP3Client
    作者:
    lhfcws

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void delete(int mailID)
      Delete a mail on the remote server by a given mailID.
      Email receive(int mailID)
      Receive the specific mail by mailID from remote POP3 server.
      List<Email> receiveLatest(int latestMailID)
      Receive mails from remote POP3 server.
